extendedInfo.description: Exercise your brain, Enjoy Sudoku! With hints that teach and unlimited games at 16 levels you will love Enjoy Sudoku. Supports phones and tablets. Our Sudoku tutorial, extensive feature set, and advanced multi-stage hint system offer something for everyone. The more you play, the more you will Enjoy Sudoku!To play for free, try our other Sudoku product: Sudoku (free).Our multi-stage hint system starts with a gentle reminder to get you back on track and works up to an illustration of the exact technique to use and how it applies to the current board. Use our hints to ease those frustrating moments and to learn how to be a better player.Features include:* Unlimited Sudoku puzzles* 16 difficulty levels* Tutorial teaches you new techniques* UI optimized for fewer touches* Supports phones and tablets* Multi-level undo and redo* Automatic or manual pencil marks* Enter games from the newspaper* Supports keyboard and trackball* Large easy to read digits* Solver (to end frustration)* Advanced techniques, including X-Wings,   sashimi fish, and coloring* Choice of six color schemes* Save your game while you try alternatives* Highlighting helps you discover patterns* Game clock; compares your time to others* Avoids distracting graphic frills* Choice of digit styles, including   Kanji and HanziAll games are true Sudoku, with symmetry and a single solution that can be discovered by logic alone. If you doubt that a Sudoku puzzle can be solved by logic, simply have the hint system explain it to you step by step.If you Enjoy Sudoku, this is the app for you![suduko,soduko,sudoko,sodoku]

reviews.title: Wish scoring worked
reviews.comment: Love the game and play it regularly. I do wish the author would fix the scoring at the end of a round; if you are playing with any difficulty at all, it appears your score is not very good. It *says* your score is based on people playing with similar difficulty, but this is not true.
reviews.author: Sean Stallings

reviews.title: Exactly what you are looking for
reviews.comment: Customizable interface, many difficulty levels so you can find your exact skill level. All in all, awesome
reviews.author: Jamie Boyle

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: I have tried a number of Sudoku apps, and none compare to this one. The difficulty levels are so easy to what the hell, that was hard. Worth buying!
reviews.author: Andrew F

reviews.title: Great app - crap colour themes
reviews.comment: The colour themes need to be customisable, otherwise its a great app.
reviews.author: Richard Aislabie

reviews.title: Good for Sudokufans
reviews.comment: My wife likes the feature that tells you the percentile rank on completion.  She says it tells her if I\'m above or below par that day!
reviews.author: Mark Lacatena

reviews.title: Best Sudoku ever on ANDROID
reviews.comment: I love this SUDOKU game so much, i tryed all others but this one is a keeper 5 stars excellent only needs a global player leader ranks scoreboards

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great puritan, been using it for years. Doesn\'t require weekly updates!

reviews.title: Great game

reviews.title: Can\'t do much better
reviews.comment: I was making a Sudoku game for my mom (who is addicted to Sudoku). Once I found this, I realized I could not do much better. For half the price of Starbucks, you get as many puzzles a day at the difficulty you want!

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: I liked it enough to get the Pro version! The Sudoku training & tutoring is excellent!

reviews.title: Keeps me occupied
reviews.comment: Great and easy to use. Well done devs!

reviews.comment: If you want to learn how to solve sudoko then this is the one. It involves helping you when you are stuck and teaching you advanced methods. Excellent app.
